text: Mario Castellazzi (9 November 1935 – 1 October 2018) was an Italian professional footballer. He played for 3 seasons (57 games, 8 goals) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma and Calcio Catania. ==External links== Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:U.S. Sassuolo Calcio players Category:U.S. Cremonese players Category:Spezia Calcio players Category:A.S. title: Mario Castellazzi
